sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import './Programs.css'; const Programs = () => { const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); const [activeCategory, setActiveCategory] = useState('all'); const [selectedProgram, setSelectedProgram] = useState(null); const sectionRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const observer = new IntersectionObserver( ([entry]) => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { setIsVisible(true); } }, { threshold: 0.2 } ); if (sectionRef.current) { observer.observe(sectionRef.current); } return () => observer.disconnect(); }, []); const programsData = [ { id: 1, title: 'Fashion Designing', category: 'fashion', duration: '2-3 Years', level: 'Diploma/Degree', description: 'Master the art of fashion design with comprehensive training in sketching, pattern making, garment construction, and fashion business.', features: ['Fashion Illustration', 'Pattern Making', 'Garment Construction', 'Textile Knowledge', 'Fashion History', 'Portfolio Development', 'Fashion Business', 'Trend Forecasting'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1558618666-fcd25c85cd64?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', icon: 'fas fa-palette', color: '#667eea', eligibility: '10+2 or equivalent', career: ['Fashion Designer', 'Creative Director', 'Stylist', 'Design Consultant', 'Fashion Entrepreneur'], fee: '₹1,50,000/year' }, { id: 2, title: 'Fine Arts & Animation', category: 'arts', duration: '1-3 Years', level: 'Certificate/Diploma', description: 'Explore creative arts with comprehensive training in drawing, painting, digital art, 2D/3D animation, and multimedia design.', features: ['Drawing & Painting', '2D Animation', '3D Modeling', 'Digital Art', 'Character Design', 'Storyboarding', 'Visual Effects', 'Multimedia Design'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1513475382585-d06e58bcb0e0?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', icon: 'fas fa-paint-brush', color: '#764ba2', eligibility: '10+2 or equivalent', career: ['Animator', 'Graphic Designer', 'Visual Artist', 'Game Designer', 'VFX Artist', 'Illustrator'], fee: '₹1,20,000/year' }, { id: 3, title: 'Computer Courses', category: 'computer', duration: '6 Months - 2 Years', level: 'Certificate/Diploma', description: 'Comprehensive computer training covering programming, web development, digital marketing, and essential software skills.', features: ['Programming Languages', 'Web Development', 'Digital Marketing', 'Graphic Design Software', 'Office Applications', 'Database Management', 'Cybersecurity Basics', 'E-commerce'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517077304055-6e89abbf09b0?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', icon: 'fas fa-laptop-code', color: '#4facfe', eligibility: '10th pass or above', career: ['Web Developer', 'Digital Marketer', 'Software Developer', 'Data Analyst', 'IT Support', 'Freelancer'], fee: '₹50,000/year' }, { id: 4, title: 'Short Term Courses', category: 'shortterm', duration: '1-6 Months', level: 'Certificate', description: 'Quick skill-building courses designed for immediate career enhancement and professional development.', features: ['Fashion Styling', 'Makeup Artistry', 'Photography', 'Social Media Marketing', 'Basic Computer Skills', 'English Communication', 'Personality Development', 'Entrepreneurship'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1434030216411-0b793f4b4173?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', icon: 'fas fa-clock', color: '#43e97b', eligibility: 'No specific requirement', career: ['Freelancer', 'Part-time Professional', 'Skill Enhancement', 'Career Change', 'Side Business'], fee: '₹15,000 - ₹40,000' } ]; const categories = [ { id: 'all', name: 'All Programs', icon: 'fas fa-th-large' }, { id: 'design', name: 'Design', icon: 'fas fa-palette' }, { id: 'business', name: 'Business', icon: 'fas fa-briefcase' }, { id: 'styling', name: 'Styling', icon: 'fas fa-user-tie' }, { id: 'media', name: 'Media', icon: 'fas fa-camera' } ]; const filteredPrograms = activeCategory === 'all' ? programsData : programsData.filter(program => program.category === activeCategory); const openModal = (program) => { setSelectedProgram(program); document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'; }; const closeModal = () => { setSelectedProgram(null); document.body.style.overflow = 'unset'; }; return (
{/* Section Header */}
Our Programs

Choose Your Path to Fashion Excellence

Discover our comprehensive range of fashion programs designed to nurture your creativity and prepare you for a successful career in the fashion industry.

{/* Category Filters */}
{categories.map((category) => ( ))}
{/* Programs Grid */}
{filteredPrograms.map((program, index) => (
{program.level} {program.duration}

{program.title}

{program.description}

{program.features.slice(0, 3).map((feature, idx) => ( {feature} ))} {program.features.length > 3 && ( +{program.features.length - 3} more )}
{program.fee}
{program.eligibility}
))}
{/* Additional Info */}

Flexible Timings

Choose from morning, afternoon, or weekend batches to suit your schedule

Industry Certification

Get certified by leading industry bodies and enhance your career prospects

Placement Support

100% placement assistance with our network of 200+ industry partners

Scholarships Available

Merit-based scholarships up to 50% for deserving and talented students

{/* Program Detail Modal */} {selectedProgram && (
e.stopPropagation()}>
{selectedProgram.level}

{selectedProgram.title}

{selectedProgram.description}

{selectedProgram.duration} {selectedProgram.fee}

Course Features

{selectedProgram.features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature}
))}

Career Opportunities

{selectedProgram.career.map((career, index) => ( {career} ))}

Eligibility

{selectedProgram.eligibility}

)} {/* Background Elements */}
); }; export default Programs;
